response.original_title: [Step™️by-Step™️ renewal Guide]  How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal?
response.overview: To cancel Geek Squad auto renewal, call (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) immediately to speak with a representative. You can also reach out to (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) if you prefer assistance via phone. Make sure to have your account details ready when calling (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) to speed up the process. For confirmation and questions, contact (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) again to ensure your subscription is fully canceled. If any issues arise, don’t hesitate to dial (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) to resolve them directly with Geek Squad support.
